items.title: Manhattan Penthouse
items.description: A sophisticated urban retreat featuring floor-to-ceiling windows, custom millwork, and curated art collection.
items.alt: Luxury Manhattan penthouse living room with modern furnishings and city views

items.title: Corporate Headquarters
items.description: Award-winning commercial design that balances productivity with wellness, featuring biophilic elements and flexible workspaces.
items.alt: Modern corporate office space with open work areas and natural lighting

items.title: Coastal Estate
items.description: A timeless beachfront residence blending indoor-outdoor living with natural materials and ocean-inspired palette.
items.alt: Coastal estate interior with natural textures and ocean views

items.title: Boutique Hotel Lobby
items.description: An elegant hospitality space that welcomes guests with refined luxury, featuring custom lighting and artisanal finishes.
items.alt: Luxury boutique hotel lobby with elegant furnishings and ambient lighting

items.title: Modern Family Home
items.description: A warm, functional family residence combining contemporary design with comfort, featuring custom storage solutions and durable materials.
items.alt: Modern family home living space with comfortable seating and warm color palette

items.title: Tech Startup Office
items.description: A vibrant commercial space designed to inspire innovation, featuring collaborative zones, quiet pods, and dynamic color accents.
items.alt: Modern tech startup office with collaborative workspaces and vibrant design
